text: Nuqsan mein pad gaye woh log jinhon ne Allah se apni mulaqaat ki ittila ko jhoot qarar diya, jab achanak woh ghadi aa jayegi to yahi log kahenge “afsos! Humse is maamle mein kaisi takseer hui ” aur inka haal yeh hoga ke apni peethon (backs) par apne gunaahon ka bojh laadhey huey hongey. Dekho! Kaisa bura bojh hai jo yeh utha rahey hain
